name: EWH Texas A&M
description:
The mission of Engineering World Health (EWH) is to inspire and mobilize the engineering community to improve the quality of health care in vulnerable communities of the developing world. They achieve this mission through innovation and effective alliances with great partners.

As a chapter of EWH, we strive to support this mission through our activities. We are actively involveed in designing novel healthcare technologies appropriate for resource-poor settings, building medical devices for use in developing countries, supporting students who repair donated medical equipment in Rwanda, staying up to date on global healthcare needs, and promoting understanding and goodwill between the developed and developing world.
summary: The mission of Engineering World Health (EWH) is to inspire and mobilize the engineering community to improve the quality of health care in vulnerable communities of the developing world.
